Verify the alert message transitions out with opacity change to 0 over 800ms
Verify the 'Select Language' dropdown displays 'English' as the current value
Click the 'Select Language' dropdown
Verify the 'Select Language' dropdown reveals a list of 5 options, each with text 'English', 'Spanish', 'French', 'German', 'Italian' respectively, and font size 15px
Verify the pagination component has bottom margin 20px
Verify the current page number '1' has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and is active
Verify other page numbers have background color #e9ecef and text color #007bff
Verify the date input field has current date '2023-10-27' as its value and is enabled
Verify its associated label text 'Event Date' is visible with text color #333333
Verify when the date picker calendar is opened, it aligns its top edge with the input field's bottom edge
Verify the 'Forgot Password?' link has text 'Forgot Password?', text color #007bff, font size 13px, and x, y coordinates at 100px, 300px relative to its parent container
Verify the 'Forgot Password?' link on hover its font weight changes to 700 with a 200ms transition
Verify the video player's progress bar has width 100% relative to the player, height 5px, and its filled portion has background color #ff0000 corresponding to the current time
Verify the video player is initially muted and auto-play with no watermark visible
Verify the 'Terms and Conditions' checkbox is visible, initially unchecked, and has aria-label 'Agree to terms and conditions'
Verify when the 'Terms and Conditions' checkbox is selected, its state changes to active
Verify when the 'Terms and Conditions' checkbox is selected, a scroll-top action sets the scroll position of the main content area to 0

Verify the product rating displays 4.5 stars out of 5, with exact text '4.5 (123 reviews)' displayed beside it, font size 14px, text color #6c757d, star icons are visible and aligned left, and count of reviews is 123
Verify the image 'product_watermark.png' is visible as a watermark on the main product image, has opacity 0.5, width 100px, height 50px, and background color rgba(0,0,0,0)
Verify the 'Contact Us' section is visible, has padding 20px, and background color #f2f2f2
Verify the 'Contact Us' section heading text 'Contact Us' has font size 20px, font family 'Georgia', and text color #333333
